nodes.text: Krill were small crustaceans that lived in water in great numbers. In the oceans of the planet Kamino, they were a major source of food for the semi-aquatic aiwha species, which had baleens in their mouths to filter krill out from seawater. On the planet Sorgan, freshwater krill were farmed by an isolated village, and were used to brew the drink spotchka.

Krill were first mentioned in the current Star Wars canon in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia, which was written by Adam Bray, Tricia Barr and Cole Horton. They had previously been mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds.

Krill made their first on-screen appearance in canon in "Chapter 4: Sanctuary," an episode of the first season of the Disney+ television series The Mandalorian. The episode aired on November 29, 2019.
